mapper.select: SELECT status FROM TRADE where id = #{tradeId}

SELECT TI.id AS trade_item_id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.sales_item_id , GI.name AS sales_item_name , TI.sales_price , TI.sales_count , TI.sales_current_count , TI.created_at FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI ON GI.id = TI.sales_item_id AND GI.gacha_id = TI.gacha_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND type = 'SALES' ORDER BY TI.created_at ASC

SELECT TI.id AS trade_item_id , TI.trade_id , TI.gacha_id , TI.exchange_give_item_id , GI_1.name AS exchange_give_item_name , TI.exchange_want_item_id , GI_2.name AS exchange_want_item_name , TI.created_at FROM TRADE_ITEM TI LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_1 ON GI_1.id = TI.exchange_give_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_2 ON GI_2.id = TI.exchange_want_item_id WHERE TI.trade_id = #{tradeId} AND type = 'EXCHANGE' ORDER BY TI.created_at ASC
SELECT GI.id AS gachaItemId, GI.name FROM GACHA_ITEM GI WHERE GI.gacha_id = (SELECT gacha_id FROM TRADE WHERE id = #{tradeId}) ORDER BY GI.created_at ASC
